items.content_html: Lightweight web server for relay requests
items.title: vicchimenti/funnelback-proxy: Lightweight web server for relay requests

items.content_html: A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.
items.title: vikiboss/60s-static-host: A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.

items.content_html: A lightweight framework for custom animations
items.title: levilindsey/animatex: A lightweight framework for custom animations

items.content_html: A lightweight javascript timezone library
items.title: spencermountain/spacetime: A lightweight javascript timezone library

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: Very lightweight Dom manipulation and creation library
items.title: krschroeder/base-elem-js: Very lightweight Dom manipulation and creation library

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.
items.title: react18-tools/kosha: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: The WhatsApp Web Electron App is a lightweight desktop application that wraps WhatsApp Web in an Electron environment, allowing users to access WhatsApp without opening a browser. It runs smoothly on Linux (Ubuntu) and can stay in the system tray like native apps.
items.title: devrob-go/whatsapp-linux: The WhatsApp Web Electron App is a lightweight desktop application that wraps WhatsApp Web in an Electron environment, allowing users to access WhatsApp without opening a browser. It runs smoothly on Linux (Ubuntu) and can stay in the system tray like native apps.

items.content_html: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.
items.title: Legcord/Legcord: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable mesh gradient animation (or static image) generator for web applications. With configurable colors, movements and effects.
items.title: romainnugou/mesh-gradient-ts: A lightweight and customizable mesh gradient animation (or static image) generator for web applications. With configurable colors, movements and effects.

items.content_html: Flux is a lightweight package manager designed to simplify dependency management for JavaScript projects.
items.title: iamgautamsuthar/flux: Flux is a lightweight package manager designed to simplify dependency management for JavaScript projects.

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight, fast PWA for getting the latest stats for lakes.
items.title: webecke/LakeStats: A simple, lightweight, fast PWA for getting the latest stats for lakes.

items.content_html: A lightweight reactive library with hook-inspired APIs for plain HTML.
items.title: kiranojhanp/super-tiny-signal: A lightweight reactive library with hook-inspired APIs for plain HTML.

items.content_html: A lightweight screen recording and editing tool with zoom animations, cursor tracking, and background customization. An open-source alternative to Screen.studio.
items.title: njraladdin/screen-demo: A lightweight screen recording and editing tool with zoom animations, cursor tracking, and background customization. An open-source alternative to Screen.studio.

items.content_html: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for validating Stalker 2 CFG file formats that use `struct.begin`/`struct.end` blocks. The extension checks for proper block nesting, indentation, and header parameter formatting, providing real-time diagnostics to help you catch mistakes as you code.
items.title: Felicheat/stalker2-cfg-extension: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for validating Stalker 2 CFG file formats that use `struct.begin`/`struct.end` blocks. The extension checks for proper block nesting, indentation, and header parameter formatting, providing real-time diagnostics to help you catch mistakes as you code.
